name: lucariatias.github.io
body:
Hi, I'm Ross, I'm a 17-year-old student living in the UK with a fascination with programming. I hope you find my stuff useful, and if there's anything you need to know, don't feel intimidated to ask.
I develop for the Vayleryn project right now, which is an upcoming strict RP Minecraft server.
If you want to use any of my code, it's more than likely licensed under a free, copyleft licence, so as long as you follow the terms set out there, it's absolutely fine. Contributions are also welcome.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
